title: Water For Health, For Healing, For Life: You're Not Sick, You're Thirsty!
description: Asthma, allergies, arthritis, hypertension, depression, headaches, diabetes, obesity, and MS. These are just some of the conditions and diseases that are caused by persistent dehydration. But there is a miracle solution that is readily available, all natural, and free: water.
author: F. Batmanghelidj
